backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, per-user knowledge base CRUD, chat message storage, and access control via authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, referenced files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx and mounts it into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile setup, theme, and routing between chat and knowledge base views.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing screen prompting users to sign in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign‑out button that clears identity and React Query cache when logging out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a profile name.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: UI component rendering individual chat messages with styling and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/knowledge/Knowle: Card UI showing a knowledge entry with edit and delete actions including confirmation dialog.
Dialog form for adding or editing knowledge entries with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation between chat and knowledge views plus user profile display and login.
App layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Hooks for retrieving chat history and sending messages, including knowledge-based auto-response generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling login, identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useKnowledgeEntries.t: Hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting knowledge base entries through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and theme variables defining light and dark color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Renders the chat UI, loads chat history, handles message input, and sends messages while auto-scrolling to new content.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Displays and manages knowledge base entries with add/edit functionality and a dialog for entry creation or modification.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, and plugins for styling and animations across the app.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, pending requests, and metadata for the MVP AI assistant app.
